itemInfo.itemDesc:
A smoked sausage. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 45 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Onion
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Oatmeal, Stir-Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Onion Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
